ComicInfo.Title: Total Annihilation
ComicInfo.Summary:
The end has come...for the human race. The final battle between the New Gods and mankinds last hope has begun and if the Hellions lose, Chaos is going to make sure not a single human survives his wrath. His plan is simple...the complete destruction of the earth itself.
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------|----------------------------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Edgar Salazar & Edgar Delgado | 1 | | B | Cover B | Ian Richardson & Hedwin Zaldivar | 2 | | C | Cover C | Alfredo Reyes & Vinicius Andrade | 3 | | D | Cover D | Sami Kivela & Mohan Sivakami | 4 |
Notes:
Cover D is a homage of the cover of The X-Men #141.
